title: LoRA-One: Efficient and Unified Low-Rank Adaptation for One-Stop Model Personalization
summary: LoRA-One is a theoretically grounded improvement to the common fine-tuning technique (LoRA), proving that the ideal starting direction for adaptation can be calculated efficiently from just a single, initial gradient step. This "spectral initialization" provides a "perfect blueprint" allowing models to converge faster, more stably, and achieve significant performance improvements over traditional methods across various benchmarks.
